post.author: 구게시판
post.content:
A branch office of a Korean Company here is looking for a person.

The detail job description is not known yet, however, the following

is a brief description.


1. Design/maintain Web application.

2. Experience on Network.


Please send your resume by July 8 to 'stevenkim@home.com'.

Thanks.
post.title: [2001/07/05] A job opportunity... (작성자: COSKA)
